tool_description: Olato Quote APIs gives you random quotes about motivation, sucess and love quotes.
name: Olato Quotes
title: Olato Quotes

api_list.name: Love Quote

test_endpoint.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other. -Audrey Hepburn

api_list.name: Success Quote

test_endpoint.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts. -Winston Churchill

api_list.name: Motivation Quote

test_endpoint.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. -Eleanor Roosevelt
